content: learn how to crochet this beautiful textured round ripple 12 point star blanket combining regular and back post double_crochet stitches this blanket creates stunning ridges - perfect if you are looking for something a little bit different to the normal round star blankets the first 6 rounds are the set up rounds then it is a simple 3 row repeat for the pattern once you are comfortable with the pattern you can mix up where the ridge row go to create unique blankets to your personal taste have fun creating
